item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 30978 - Fixed re-serialization of tRefErr3d and tAreaErr3d

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45234 - Removed incorrect shared formula conversion in CFRuleRecord

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45001 - Improved HWPF Range.replaceText()

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44692 - Fixed HSSFPicture.resize() to properly resize pictures if the underlying columns/rows have modified size

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Support custom image renderers in HSLF

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : Correctly increment the reference count of a blip when a picture is inserted

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45110 - Fixed TextShape.resizeToFitText() to properly resize TextShape

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45091 - Fixed serialization of RefN~ tokens. Simplified Ptg class hierarchy

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45133 - Fixed OBJ Record (5Dh) to pad the sub-record data to a 4-byte boundary

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45145 - Fixed Sheet to always enforce RowRecordsAggregate before ValueRecordsAggregate

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45123 - Fixed SharedFormulaRecord.convertSharedFormulas() to propagate token operand classes

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45087 - Correctly detect date formats like [Black]YYYY as being date based

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45060 - Improved token class transformation during formula parsing

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44840 - Improved handling of HSSFObjectData, especially for entries with data held not in POIFS

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45043 - Support for getting excel cell comments when extracting text

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Extend the support for specifying a policy to HSSF on missing / blank cells when fetching, to be able to specify the policy at the HSSFWorkbook level

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45025 - improved FormulaParser parse error messages

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45046 - allowed EXTERNALBOOK(0x01AE) to be optional in the LinkTable

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45066 - fixed sheet encoding size mismatch problems

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45003 - Support embeded HDGF visio documents

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45001 - Partial fix for HWPF Range.insertBefore() and Range.delete() with unicode characters

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44977 - Support for AM/PM in excel date formats

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Support for specifying a policy to HSSF on missing / blank cells when fetching

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44937 - Partial support for extracting Escher images from HWPF files

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44824 - Avoid an infinite loop when reading some HWPF pictures

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44898 - Correctly handle short last blocks in POIFS
